content: azra s love horse amigurumi horse / unicorn crochet pattern - english pattern only the pattern is written in english and using us crochet terms the pattern is straight forward and easy to follow there is lots of pictures in this pattern lots of step by step images especially on the special parts you need to know the basic crochet skill for amigurumi especially how to work in rounds or spiral some examples of stitches single_crochet increases and decreases you will find pattern for 4 different head looks = the white area is different on 3 and one without any color changes there will also be 2 different ways to make the hair please take a look at the pictures on this page to see the different looks then it is just for you to apply your colors as you wish and make the horse/unicorn you want materials required yarn i used medium weight 4 ply cotton yarn drops safran but any yarn of your choice will work for both the doll itself and the hair crochet hook 2 0 or any of your choice fibrefill / toy stuffing security eyes 6 mm stitch markers scissor and embroidery needle size approx 12 cm when using drops safran and 2 0 mm crochet hook the pattern is a pdf and you will need adobe reader to open it adobe reader is free to download from the internet please note these patterns are for personal use only you may make as many items as you wish for yourself or as gifts you may sell any items you produce from this pattern in small quantities but please link back or give credit to me as the designer please do not reproduce or sell this pattern or any pictures please respect my rights as a designer please follow my instagram account @handmade_by_halime thank you
